detaileddescription.para: An application can register actions which will show up in a 'start-menu' like popup

Add a workspace.
wm
The window-manager.
ws
The workspace to add.

Switch to a workspace.
wm
The window-manager.
n
Index of the workspace to switch to.
TRUE if the switch was successful.

Switch to the previous workspace from the current one.
wm
The window-manager.

Switch to the next workspace from the current one.
wm
The window-manager.

Move a window to a specific workspace.
wm
The window manager.
neww
The new workspace.
widget
The widget to move.

Set the list of workspaces .
wm
The window manager.
workspaces
The list of workspaces.

Find the workspace that contains a specific widget.
wm
The window-manager.
widget
The widget to find.
The workspace that has the widget.

Decorate a window.
wm
The window-manager.
widget
The widget to decorate.

Close a window.
wm
The window-manager.
widget
The window to close.

simplesect.para: TRUE of the string was processed, FALSE otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (GntWM *wm, GntMouseEvent event, int x, int y, GntWidget *widget)
memberdef.name: gnt_wm_process_click

detaileddescription.para:
Process a click event.
wm
The window manager.
event
The mouse event.
x
The x-coordinate of the mouse.
y
The y-coordinate of the mouse.
widget
The widget under the mouse.
TRUE if the event was handled, FALSE otherwise.

Resize a window.
wm
The window manager.
widget
The window to resize.
width
The desired width of the window.
height
The desired height of the window.

Move a window.
wm
The window manager.
widget
The window to move.
x
The desired x-coordinate of the window.
y
The desired y-coordinate of the window.

Update a window.
wm
The window-manager.
widget
The window to update.

Raise a window.
wm
The window-manager.
widget
The window to raise.

simplesect.para: The idle time of the user.
